name: project-scaffold
description: * Clone the repo * Open package.json, change 'name' and any other applicable fields to your new projects information. * Repeat the previous step for bower.json * If using any CSS frameworks, in index.html uncomment the vendor.min.css link in the head * If you plan to use bootstrap, in gulpfile.js, uncomment the labeled section on line 16, and comment out the previous line 15 * Use npm install, and bower install to install necessary dependencies * Use gulp build to build js and css files to be included * Use gulp serve to launch the development server
author: Connor Larsen
